statements: SELECT * FROM TemperatureData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT date, temperature FROM TemperatureData ORDER BY temperature DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS Average_Temperature FROM TemperatureData;
SELECT temperature, humidity, date FROM TemperatureData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT date, temperature FROM TemperatureData WHERE humidity > 50 ORDER BY temperature ASC;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature < 10 AND humidity > 80 ORDER BY date;
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM TemperatureData WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' AND date < '2022-02-01';
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData WHERE date = '2022-03-15' AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Readings
SELECT temperature, timestamp FROM Temperature_Readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT reading_id, temperature FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE temperature > 25
SELECT * FROM Compost_Status WHERE status = 'Ready'
SELECT compost_id, compost_temperature FROM Compost_Status ORDER BY last_update
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM Compost_Status WHERE status = 'ready' ORDER BY last_update ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT MAX(temperature), MIN(temperature) FROM Temperature_Readings;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_readings FROM Temperature_Readings;
SELECT reading_id, temperature, timestamp FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData
SELECT id, temperature, timestamp FROM TemperatureData WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT bin_id, location FROM CompostingBins WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location
SELECT monitoring_id, bin_id, timestamp, status FROM ProcessMonitoring WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT * FROM TemperatureData WHERE timestamp >= '2023-01-01'
SELECT id, timestamp, temperature FROM TemperatureData ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT bin_id, location, capacity FROM CompostingBins WHERE capacity > 50 ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT monitoring_id, bin_id, timestamp, status FROM ProcessMonitoring WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT bin_id, location, capacity FROM CompostingBins WHERE location LIKE 'South%' ORDER BY bin_id DESC;
SELECT monitoring_id, bin_id, timestamp, status FROM ProcessMonitoring WHERE status != 'inactive' ORDER BY monitoring_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM composting_site;
SELECT site_name, location FROM composting_site;
SELECT site_name, location FROM composting_site WHERE site_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM temperature_sensor ORDER BY sensor_id DESC;
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time FROM composting_process WHERE completed = true;
SELECT * FROM composting_site;
SELECT site_name, location FROM composting_site ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time FROM composting_process WHERE completed = TRUE;

SELECT site_name, sensor_name, reading_value, reading_time FROM composting_site JOIN temperature_sensor ON composting_site.site_id = temperature_sensor.site_id JOIN temperature_reading ON temperature_sensor.sensor_id = temperature_reading.sensor_id;
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time FROM composting_process WHERE site_id = 1 ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Readings;
SELECT id, temperature, location FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE temperature > 50;
SELECT location, timestamp FROM Temperature_Readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM Composting_Bins WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT location, temperature_threshold FROM Composting_Bins WHERE temperature_threshold < 30;
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Readings ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT id, temperature FROM Temperature_Readings WHERE location='Kitchen'
SELECT * FROM Temperature_Alerts WHERE time_sent >= '2021-10-01 00:00:00' AND time_sent < '2021-10-10 23:59:59'
SELECT location, AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM Temperature_Readings GROUP BY location HAVING avg_temp > 25
SELECT Bin_Log.log_id, Bin_Log.timestamp, Bin_Log.activity, Composting_Bins.temperature_threshold FROM Bin_Log INNER JOIN Composting_Bins ON Bin_Log.bin_id = Composting_Bins.bin_id
